product_name: Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps Twin Pack - 6 ft.
long_description: The Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps are a great choice for securing kayaks, canoes, or luggage on the roof of your car. 1 in. heavy-duty webbing features extra-strength stitiching. Galvanized buckle features a buckle protector to prevent scratching; buckle protector can be slid on or off. Center-spring mounted cams offer a strong, secure grip. Includes two 6 ft. straps.
short_description: The Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps are a great choice for securing kayaks, canoes, or luggage on the roof of your car.
